member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpRouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpAttributeRoutes(System.Web.Http.HttpRouteCollection)
member.summary: Scans the calling assembly for all routes defined with AttributeRouting attributes, using the default conventions.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpRouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpAttributeRoutes(System.Web.Http.HttpRouteCollection,System.Action{AttributeRouting.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration})
member.summary: Scans the specified assemblies for all routes defined with AttributeRouting attributes, and applies configuration options against the routes found.
member.param: The initialization action that builds the configuration object

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.SelfHost.HttpRouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpAttributeRoutes(System.Web.Http.HttpRouteCollection,AttributeRouting.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Scans the specified assemblies for all routes defined with AttributeRouting attributes, and applies configuration options against the routes found.
